title: Boards Profile picture. Wont change!
body: I have the El Leon Gnar profile picture on my game, but I still have the draven profile picture on the boards. How do I change it to be El Leon Gnar?

replies.body: Try switching it to a different icon, reply to board posts to update your profile etc. If all else fails just ask riot support whats the problem!

It isn't just you, my boards pic is the poro chewing on the crystal ball from 2015 pick'ems, I haven't been using that one since May 2016, when the Iron Inquisitor Kayle skin came out. I was using the winged sword pic until October when the Star Guardian skins came out but nope, still the poro. I'm assuming that since yours still has draven, it wasn't fixed by the "boop"?

Sometimes it takes a bit for an account to sync with their boards profile.  I boop'd your account to try and process it faster, but I can't make any guarantees.  Hopefully, the icon will update in no time!
Awesome! I really appreciate the effort! However, Ive had the El Leon Gnar icon for about a month now. If it doesnt update, what should I do? But for noe, Cheers to hoping =)
